description.default: Your faith has made you WHOLE! Fully heals ALL party fish and cures ALL status effects. The ultimate do-over!
description.christian_edition: Your faith has made you whole. Fully heals all party fish and cures all status effects.

battle_text.default: Jesus touches the afflicted with compassion. INSTANT HEALING! Everyone's back to full HP!
battle_text.christian_edition: Jesus heals the sick with a touch. All fish are restored to full health.

description.default: Feed the MULTITUDE! Multiplies the effects of ALL bread items by 3x for this battle. Bread stock goes BRRR!
description.christian_edition: Feed the multitude. Multiplies the effects of all bread items by 3x for this battle.

battle_text.default: Jesus blesses the bread and fish. MULTIPLY! Bread is now 3x more effective! Economics don't work like this!
battle_text.christian_edition: Jesus blesses the provisions. All bread items are now three times more effective.

description.default: The WRATH of the righteous! Deals 300 HOLY damage to ALL enemies and reduces their stats by 50% for 3 turns. Table-flipping intensity!
description.christian_edition: Righteous judgment upon the wicked. Deals 300 Holy damage to all enemies and reduces their stats by 50% for 3 turns.

battle_text.default: Jesus overturns the tables of the wicked! *CRASH* 'MY FATHER'S HOUSE!' MASSIVE damage! Stats CRUSHED!
battle_text.christian_edition: Jesus drives out those who defile the temple. His righteous anger strikes down the enemies.

description.default: 'LAZARUS, COME FORTH!' Revives ALL fainted fish with FULL HP and grants IMMUNITY for 2 turns. Ultimate comeback!
description.christian_edition: Lazarus, come forth! Revives all fainted fish with full HP and grants immunity for 2 turns.

battle_text.default: Jesus calls with a LOUD voice! 'COME FORTH!' The dead rise! Full HP! Invincible! ULTIMATE POWER!
battle_text.christian_edition: Jesus commands with authority. 'Come forth!' The fallen are raised and protected by divine power.

unlock_condition.description: Unlocked after defeating Death and raising Lazarus

description.default: The Miracle Meter fills as you fight! Once full, unleash DIVINE POWER!
description.christian_edition: The Miracle Meter represents faith building through trials. Once full, you can perform a miracle.

metadata.description: Jesus's special abilities (limit breaks) with dual-text support
